summary: An Ordinance granting permission to Frank Tregoning and Charles F. Tregoning to construct a Lateral Sewer at the intersection of 32nd Avenue Northwest and West 61st Street from a connection with the existing sewer in West 61st Street six feet east of the east margin of 32nd Avenue Northwest to the west margin of 32nd Avenue Northwest; at their own cost and expense, under certain terms and conditions, and declaring an emergency.
